item.description:
Did you miss the 5,000 Member Celebration? Growing a little tired of your old friends? Does the upcoming ‘Holiday Office Party’ fill you with dread? Don’t worry; we’re here to help!

In classic Social Fun style, we’re celebrating another party! Turns out, our last one was such a hit that people asked for more. Guess that’s what happens when you fill the place with such amazing people! Just like last time, we have the entire second floor reserved. There will be complimentary food, drink specials, and a chance to meet and greet some of the coolest folks around.

 

For this party we will be partnering with the Boston Volunteers, Boston's most popular volunteer Meetup.

Learn more: http://www.meetup.com/BigEnoughtoDeliver/

 


Pick up a Boston Volunteer T-shirt, bring a friend who you think might like get involved, schmooze with the event organizers, and spend time with some truly great people.

We anticipate celebrating with you!

Josh, Nagina, Phani, Sehily, Imanuela, Corey, Nick, Steph and Elana

 

P.S. Learn more or discover who else is coming:

http://www.meetup.com/BigEnoughtoDeliver/events/87518562/

 

The Boston Volunteers
Big enough to Deliver, small enough to care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org

 

P.P.S. Hundreds of Meetupers will be partying. There will be a special complementary cupcake for you. Don't miss this:

http://www.meetup.com/BigEnoughtoDeliver/events/87518562/
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole 2nd floor of Jose McIntyre's to ourselves. Look for us at the top of the stairs.
item.name: Celebrate our Popular Party. Complementary food for you! Who else...
